radar.description: The NoA Ignite Martech Radar is a list of technologies, complemented by an assessment result, called ring assignment. We use four rings with the following semantics:
radar.name: NoA Martech Radar

rings.description: we are good at this matter, this is the company's core.
rings.name: ADOPT

rings.description: things that are researched. They have been used in an internal project or maybe even in a commercial one. Creating PoC is also qualifying a given platform or technology to the trail ring. The important thing is that we shifted from the "thinking" stage to "doing".
rings.name: TRIAL

rings.description: we want to check a given technology/platform, we have not used it in the commercial or internal projects yet, we are just thinking about it.
rings.name: ASSESS

rings.description: we used it, but we don't want to work with a given technology/platform anymore.
rings.name: HOLD

radar.title: NoA Ignite PL - Martech Radar Apr 2022
